  • Constructor Details

    • AppConfigContext

      public AppConfigContext(Integer serverSocketPort, Integer serverRmiPort, Integer maxConnections, boolean keepAlive, boolean isServer, boolean showGUI, boolean useRMI, String serverAddress, boolean showDebug, long maxInactivityTimeMs)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      serverSocketPort - The server socket port number.
      serverRmiPort - The server rmi port number.
      maxConnections - The maximum allowed connections.
      keepAlive - The socket keep alive flag.
      isServer - Run app in server mode flag.
      showGUI - Show GUI client flag.
      useRMI - Use RMI over socket flag.
      serverAddress - Address where to find server.
      showDebug - Show debug infos flag.
      maxInactivityTimeMs - Milliseconds to wait for inactive players before disconnecting.
